name: Accordion item
help: You can include HTML tags to improve the content of the accordion item, like for example: bold, italic, link.

title.name: Title
title.help: Mandatory. Title/name of the accordion item

content.name: Content
content.help: Mandatory. Content (or description) of the accordion item.

image.name: Image
image.help: Allows to add an image to the accordion item.

size.name: Image size
size.help: Allows to change the image size

image_position.name: Image position
image_position.help: Allows to define where the image will display: 1) Before the content; 2) After the content.
